metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a brain-washed follower of Cazador.He is cleaning walls / objects in one of the hallways.NOTE Please rename Servant_004 to Greenfern.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Act 3 Lower City - Cazador's Palace - KennelClick on the servant.

0.speaker: Greenfern
0.text: I must be busy. Busy busy busy. Master might see me! Master might approve!

1.speaker: Greenfern
1.text: If the master is dead, then for whom do I clean? For whom do I scour and polish?

2.speaker: Greenfern
2.text: They say there's a new master. I must offer him everything. Everything.

3.speaker: Greenfern
3.text: Shh, shh. Not now. Busy busy busy.
